videoCredits.exercismProfile:
**Functional Purpose**: Link to the author's Exercism profile
**UI Location**: Video Credits component (within Community Video Modal)
**When Users See This**: When viewing a community video modal that has author information with an Exercism profile link.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Exercism Profile"
videoCredits.youTubeChannel:
**Functional Purpose**: Link to the author's YouTube channel
**UI Location**: Video Credits component (within Community Video Modal)
**When Users See This**: When viewing a community video modal that has author information with a YouTube channel link.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "YouTube Channel"
communityVideoModal.postedBy:
**Functional Purpose**: Label indicating who submitted the video
**UI Location**: Community Video Modal (below the video player and credits)
**When Users See This**: When viewing any community video in the modal.
**Technical Context**: This text precedes a dynamic `@handle` and a date.
**Current English**: "Posted by"
